description:
Get the job you've always dreamed of.

Prove that you have the knowledge.

And get paid more!!!

Employees who hold a Microsoft Office Specialist (MOS) certification can earn up to $16,000 more, annually, than their peers even at entry-level.

29% high-wage positions require Office-related skills.

91% percent of hiring managers consider certification as part of their hiring criteria.

About this course:

  • Includes all the details needed for 77-418 certification exam.
  • 34 lectures with over 2,5 hours of content.
  • Lots of exercises.
  • Full, free lifetime access.
  • All future extra lectures and upgrades are always included for free
  • Unconditional Udemy 30 day money-back guarantee.
After this course; you'll be ready to take the exam and also will be a certified proffessional ready to be hired! Don't waste your time and get started NOW!!!
title: Everything You Need To Know About Microsoft Word 2013
